SEARCH
Package main.java.neat.functions

Class ActivationFunction

java.lang.Object
main.java.neat.functions.ActivationFunction
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public abstract class ActivationFunction extends Object implements Serializable
Abstract base class for neural network activation functions. This class defines the structure and behavior of activation functions used in the NEAT implementation. Activation functions transform the aggregated input of a neural network node into an output signal. Different activation functions provide different non-linear transformations that are suitable for various problem domains. The class also provides factory methods for creating specific activation function instances based on type or at random.
Author:
Taher Joudeh

    • ActivationFunction

      public ActivationFunction(double threshold)
      Creates a new activation function with the specified threshold.
      Parameters:
      threshold - The value above which the function is considered activated

  • Method Details

    • getThreshold

      public double getThreshold()
      Gets the activation threshold for this function.
      Returns:
      The current threshold value

    • isActivated

      public boolean isActivated()
      Checks if the last computed activation value exceeds the threshold.
      Returns:
      true if the node is activated, false otherwise

    • activate

      public abstract double activate(double x)
      Applies the activation function to the input value. This method must be implemented by all concrete activation functions.
      Parameters:
      x - The input value to be transformed
      Returns:
      The transformed output value

    • clone

      public abstract ActivationFunction clone()
      Creates a deep copy of this activation function.
      Returns:
      A new instance of the same activation function with the same parameters

    • getActivationFunction

      public static final ActivationFunction getActivationFunction(ActivationFunction.ACTIVATION_FUNCTION activationFunction, ActivationConfig actConfig)
      Factory method to create an activation function of the specified type. This method uses the provided ActivationConfig to initialize the function with appropriate threshold values.
      Parameters:
      activationFunction - The type of activation function to create
      actConfig - Configuration object containing threshold parameters
      Returns:
      A new activation function instance of the requested type

    • getRandomActivationFunction

      public static ActivationFunction getRandomActivationFunction(ActivationConfig actConfig)
      Creates a random activation function from the available types.
      Parameters:
      actConfig - Configuration object containing threshold parameters
      Returns:
      A randomly selected activation function instance
